name: vitejs-stack-mern-quickstart
description: This project combines the power of Vite.js and the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack.
author: saida

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn run start" "cd client && yarn run start" "cd client && yarn run sass"
scripts.dev-client: concurrently "cd client && yarn run dev" "cd client && yarn run sass"
